attributes.action: reconsider the banning of Mr J Clarke from the George Ashley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A loyal and regular customer who merely aired his views honestly has been banned from this small village pub. As the oldest person born in the village and still living there, he ought to get out more, but banning him from the one pub in the village is cruel and inhumane.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
